page.title: 06KINGSKERSWELL/SCHOOL&CLUBS
page.content: {OUR SCHOOL.KINGSKERSWELL PRIMARY. Group 4.-No.of children 224.Split site {Visits-}Dartmoor,Chagford and Slapton. Day Trips_Morwellham,Shire Horse,canal trip,Cockington,Paignton Zoo and beach {Teachers of the school-} Mrs.Wolf,Miss.Thorn,Mrs.Ridly,Mr.Bunce Mr.Rowell,Mrs.Atkinson,Miss. Stokes. {Assemblys- Mondays we have hymn practice and on Fridays we just have an assembly our Headmaster is Mr.Strong. { {Events:sports day,summer fete and {winter bizarre {CLUBS.} BROWNIES.Two packs-Tuesday & Thursday. GUIDES.One pack-Monday-School Hall. CUBS:Two packs- Monday & Wednesday. SCOUTS:One pack-Friday 7.00-9.00. YOUTH CLUB:Monday-Public Hall-6.45. VENTURE SCOUTS:Scout Hut-No special day.
